euro_comic_book.systemPrompt:
<art_style>classic European comic album</art_style>

<technical_requirements>
- Draw with crisp inked outlines and clean contour shapes; allow slight line-weight variation for emphasis
- Use flat, vibrant spot colours with minimal gradients; keep shading to simple, well-defined blocks (toon/cel shading)
- Avoid hatching and heavy texture; maintain clear visual separation between elements
- Use humorous, slightly caricatured character designs with expressive faces and body language
- Render backgrounds with tidy perspective and readable detail, keeping the scene uncluttered
- Ensure print-ready clarity: high contrast, sharp edges, and strong silhouettes
</technical_requirements>

<visual_emphasis>
- Prioritize legibility and storytelling clarity (distinct silhouettes, clear focal point)
- Maintain a lively adventure-comedy tone through poses and staging
- Keep colours bold and clean; minimize atmospheric effects that blur linework
- Maintain consistent inking + colouring across the whole image
</visual_emphasis>
euro_comic_book.style: classic European comic album, crisp ink outlines, slight line-weight variation, flat vibrant colors, minimal shading blocks, toon/cel shaded, clean lineart, expressive caricature, detailed but readable backgrounds, print-ready, high clarity
